channel.title: I need help with a compiler!
channel.description: i am working with a client that uses all .class files and no .java it won't compiler for me and i know there are different compilers out there. just give me your compiler scripts. here is mine [code]@echo off echo KingScape Compiler title KingScape Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 01:22:08 pm[/size][hr]plz!

item.title: I need help with a compiler!
item.dc:creator: @durfx durfx
item.description:
@durfx wrote:

uhm when u compile it. what it does it takes the .java files and converts them into the .class files so java can recognize and use these files
without having any .java files there would be no need to compile

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a compiler!

item.title: I need help with a compiler!
item.dc:creator: @ryry871 ryry871
item.description:
@ryry871 wrote:

Well here is min even though I don’t know if it will work with YOUR client. It works just fine for mine(Ryan’s Client V2)

@echo off :menu title Ryan's Compiler echo Ryan's Client Compiler echo _-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_- echo ALL ERRORS ARE BELOW! echo _-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_- if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a compiler!

item.title: I need help with a compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

i am working with a client that uses all .class files and no .java it won’t compiler for me and i know there are different compilers out there. just give me your compiler scripts. here is mine

@echo off echo KingScape Compiler title KingScape Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 01:22:08 pm[/size][hr]plz!

Read full topic
